resources.string: Everything about the Resurrection Remix OS
Show your support to Resurrection Remix OS
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Use same icon style as above in QS battery tile
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Show charging animation on ambient display
Toggle to view the charging animation on lockscreen ambient display
Always display battery percentage when charging
Adjust brightness from the Quick Settings
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Get more information about Resurrection Remix OS
Be a member of Resurrection forum
Official substratum theme of Resurrection Remix OS

List of devices and their official RR-OS maintainers

Let people know you use Resurrection Remix OS
Reset all configurations to default values?
Enable/disable to show/hide floating button in RR tools. Enter/exit once when switch used

Enable or disable animations when tapping qs tiles and customize them
Customize colors, icons and various layouts of system
Choose various gestures acquired on screen
Enable, disable and customize various elements provided on lockscreen

Customize the weather items on statusbar
Enable or disable various security features provided for lockscreen
Draw your gestures to launch preferred activity
Use a side bar to store your apps and activities that can be launched quickly with ease
Use a circular sidebar to store your quick apps and activities
Swipe from the edge to enable/disable a pie that consists of cool shortcuts and navigation controls
Customize the animations of each window in system
Enable or disable animations in power menu and also choose from a list of animations
Customize various toast popup animations and icons
Enable or disable ambient display and customize its components

Customize various elements of the system
Customize various hardware buttons on your device like home, back, and menu

This visibility configuration also applies to the ambient display
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Edit the navigation bar layout and buttons
Condition icon is shown on Lockscreen
Condition icon is hidden on Lockscreen
To configure and use system profiles, turn profiles on.
Set your own LCD density value
Press on color below to apply
Auto / Automatically raises the refresh rate from 60 to 90Hz for some content
60Hz / Refresh rate locked at 60Hz for all content
90Hz / Refresh rate locked at 90Hz for all content. Increased battery usage
Battery history stats are going to be reset
Swipe fingerprint left or right to dismiss notifications
To dismiss your notifications, swipe left or right on the fingerprint sensor on the back of your phone.
Long press the volume rocker to skip tracks when playing music, even remotely on tv or PC with e.g. Spotify (app must run on the phone and show the notification).
Show Ambient Display instead of normal losckreen on wake gestures
Show Ambient Display when a new music track is played
Set number of of quick tiles on the quick panel.
Show title under quick tiles of each icon
Quickly disable heads up for all apps but keep them enabled for dialer and messaging apps
Disable heads-up notifications in these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Display negotiated charger max current-voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Color range used on dark status bar
Color range used on light status bar

Charging color used on light status bar
This will hide all force close notificaitons
Tap here to add to the list, tap on the listed app to remove

Tap here to add, tap on the listed app to remove

Bug reporting is disabled in development settings

When restarting also show options for recovery and bootloader
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Tint logo to accent color. This might cause visibility problems on dark or light statusbars.

Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu

Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled

Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Toggle to enable setting max notifications count on lockscreen
Control the maximum number of expanded notifications to show on lockscreen
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
You are about to change layout to tabs (nougat) which was present in previous versions of RR-OS and is the default one. Are you sure you want to continue?
You are about to change layout to classic (marshmallow) which was present in previous versions of RR-OS. Are you sure you want to continue?
You are about to change layout to bottom navigation layout (oreo) which is a brand new layout in RR-OS tools. It might be a little different that the usual layout. Are you sure you want to continue?
Enable custom color for bottom navigtation in RR
Customize your plugged in charging sounds
Show current network traffic levels in the status bar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Whether to show traffic measurement units in the statusbar
Network traffic disabled due to clock position
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Use wallpaper color for FOD icon
Uses adjusted primary wallpaper color for FOD icon\nNOTE: might look good only with some wallpapers
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
When Gaming mode is turned on, buttons will be locked
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Shows animation while reading your finger. This will not work on ambient display
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Select an image to use for static mode
Enable or disable custom images from image packs in quick settings header.
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Customize the animations of each window in system
Blur empty space in notification panel below quick settings
Allow accessing power menu on secure lockscreen
Show data usage in qs header
Shows data usage in quick settings header of sim used for data
Reset battery statistics after reaching user defined charging level
Smart Charging allows you to set maximum charging level to extend the lifespan of your battery
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
vibration pattern, vibration intensity, incall, haptics, tap, vibration strength
Use fingerprint unlock to view notification
Allows to unlock device with fingerprint on notification double tap without need to input pin/password/pattern
Vibrate when fingerprint authentication is successful
Animate smooth lava lamp style color blend
Enable to show visualiser on ambient display as well
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Sets edge light color to the primary color of wallpaper
Swipe up on the lockscreen to use face unlock
Portion of screen height used as touchable region for back gesture.
Show an animated arrow for back gesture.
This will hide both the navigation bar and the pill for a seamless fullscreen gesture experience.
This option is only available for gesture navigation!
SystemUI will be restarted so that selected setting can be applied correctly.
Hide the navigation bar pill for seamless fullscreen gestures.
Enable haptic tick effect on back gesture
Disable height of virtual keyboard as touchable region for back gesture
Whether to show R style notification headers (Requires a SystemUI restart)

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life. Please note that turning on smartpixels could affect fingerprint scanner peformance. This applies to only in display-fingerprint scanners as pixels on the screen keep shifting.
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
\n\nThe schedule from sunset to sunrise requires enabled location services to get the correct times for your location.
Focus ringtone on different audio components of the device
Headset only if music is active
